



#!/bin/bash

FILENAME="././github/workflows/config.yml"
WORD_TO_REPLACE="main"
NEW_WORD="new_word"

curl -u fogadOg: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 \
  -X POST \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/fogadOg/javaSearchEngine/actions/workflows/pushRequest.yml/dispatches \
  -d "{\"ref\":\"main\",\"inputs\":{\"filename\":\"$FILENAME\",\"word_to_replace\":\"$WORD_TO_REPLACE\",\"new_word\":\"$NEW_WORD\"}}"
